hostess.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a woman at a party, meal etc who has invited all the guests and provides them with food, drink etc
hostess.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a woman who introduces and talks to the guests on a television or radio show
hostess.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a woman who shows people to seats in a restaurant in the US
hostess.translation[0].definitions[3].de: a woman whose job is to entertain men at a nightclub
hostess.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a type of sweet baked food, including Twinkies, chocolate cup cakes (=small cakes for one person), and small fruit pies
